content: stanton like most of my patterns i name them for where i m traveling to same goes for these matt my dh and i were on our way to a nearby lake for lunch and some fishing that is next to a small town named stanton between the color and the stitch pattern it just seemed right size i made these to fit my feet which are a woman s size 7 1/2 8 to make the socks larger or smaller cast on stitches in multiples of 4 needles us 1 2 25mm double points you can also use magicloop or two circulars whatever is comfortable for you but directions are written using 5 double points you will also need a darning needle to weave in ends yarn 100 gram of fingering weight yarn i used 91 grams of mountain colors crazyfoot in the sagebrush color for the ones in the pictures abbreviations k - knit p - purl k2tog - knit 2 together ssk - slip one stitch as if to knit slip the next stitch the same way slide these two stitches back onto left needle and knit the two stitches together s - slip directions cuff cast on 64 stitches dividing 16 stitches per needle and join in the round being careful not to twist stitches knit a k2 p2 rib for 10 row or until cuff reaches the length you like leg begin working 4 stitch leg chart around until you have reached desired length i knit 19 repeats for mine heel continue with leg chart along two of the needles for 32 row 8 pattern repeats or use any heel type that you prefer heel turn row 1 - s1 p16 p2tog p1 turn row 2 - s1 k3 ssk k1 turn row 3 - s1 purl until one stitch before gap from previous row p2tog p1 turn row 4 - s1 knit until one stitch before gap ssk p1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 until all of the stitches have been used up 18 stitches remaining gusset set up row 1- pick up and knit 16 stitches along heel flap and one extra stitch before held stitches this is now needle 1 slide 9 of the heel stitches onto this needle knit along held needles now 2 & 3 in pattern pick up and knit 16 stitches along flap plus the one extra to close gap along with the 9 remaining stitches from the turned heel this is now needle 4 row 1 - knit across needle 1 until 3 stitches remain k2tog k1 knit across needles 2 & 3 in pattern k1 ssk knit until the end of needle 4 row 2 - knit across needles 1 & 4 knit across 2 & 3 in pattern repeat row 1 & 2 until there are 16 stitches left on needles 1 & 4 foot continue working chart on needles 2 & 3 and stockinette stitch on needles 1 & 4 until foot is
